Assembled **Note:** Your Mac has been powered-on for **{uptimeHumanReadable}**. For more reliable results, please manually restart your Mac before proceeding.
Assembled **Note:** Your Mac has been powered-on for **{uptimeHumanReadable}**. For more reliable results, please manually restart your Mac before proceeding.
Assembled **Hinweis:** Ihr Mac laeuft seit **{uptimeHumanReadable}**. Starten Sie ihn fuer zuverlaessigere Ergebnisse bitte manuell neu.
Assembled **Note :** Votre Mac est allume depuis **{uptimeHumanReadable}**. Redemarrez-le manuellement pour de meilleurs resultats.
Assembled **Note:** Your Mac has only **{diskSpaceHumanReadable}**, which may prevent this macOS {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l}.
Assembled **Note:** Your Mac has only **{diskSpaceHumanReadable}**, which may prevent this macOS {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l}.
Assembled **Hinweis:** Ihr Mac hat nur **{diskSpaceHumanReadable}** frei. Dadurch kann dieses macOS-{titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} scheitern.
Assembled **Note :** Votre Mac ne dispose que de **{diskSpaceHumanReadable}**, ce qui peut empecher cette {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} macOS.
Assembled **Good news!** The macOS {ddmVersionString} update has already been downloaded to your Mac and is ready to install. Installation will proceed quickly when you click **{button1text}**.
Assembled **Good news!** The macOS {ddmVersionString} update has already been downloaded to your Mac and is ready to install. Installation will proceed quickly when you click **{button1text}**.
Assembled **Gute Nachricht!** Das macOS-{ddmVersionString}-Update wurde bereits geladen. Die Installation startet schnell, wenn Sie **{button1text}** klicken.
Assembled **Bonne nouvelle !** La mise a jour macOS {ddmVersionString} est deja telechargee. L'installation sera rapide apres clic sur **{button1text}**.
Assembled Your Mac has begun downloading and preparing required macOS update components. Installation will be quicker once all assets have finished staging.
Assembled Your Mac has begun downloading and preparing required macOS update components. Installation will be quicker once all assets have finished staging.
Assembled Ihr Mac laedt bereits erforderliche macOS-Update-Komponenten herunter und bereitet sie vor. Die Installation wird danach schneller sein.
Assembled Votre Mac a commence a telecharger et preparer les composants requis de mise a jour macOS. L'installation sera ensuite plus rapide.
Assembled Your Mac will begin downloading the update shortly.
Assembled Your Mac will begin downloading the update shortly.
Assembled Ihr Mac beginnt in Kuerze mit dem Download des Updates.
Assembled Votre Mac commencera bientot a telecharger la mise a jour.

Assembled **A required macOS {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} is now available**

Greetings, {loggedInUserFirstname}!

Please {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} to macOS **{ddmVersionString}** to ensure your Mac remains secure and compliant with organizational policies.{updateReadyMessage}

To perform the {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} now, click **{button1text}**, review the on-screen instructions, then click **{softwareUpdateButtonText}**.

If you are unable to perform this {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} now, click **{button2text}** to be reminded again later (which is disabled when the deadline is imminent).

However, your device **will automatically restart and {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l}** on **{ddmEnforcedInstallDateHumanReadable}** if you have not {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l}d before the deadline.{excessiveUptimeWarningMessage}{diskSpaceWarningMessage}

For assistance, please contact **{supportTeamName}** by clicking the (?) button in the bottom, right-hand corner.

Assembled **A required macOS {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} is now available**

Greetings, {loggedInUserFirstname}!

Please {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} to macOS **{ddmVersionString}** to ensure your Mac remains secure and compliant with organizational policies.{updateReadyMessage}

To perform the {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} now, click **{button1text}**, review the on-screen instructions, then click **{softwareUpdateButtonText}**.

If you are unable to perform this {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} now, click **{button2text}** to be reminded again later (which is disabled when the deadline is imminent).

However, your device **will automatically restart and {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l}** on **{ddmEnforcedInstallDateHumanReadable}** if you have not {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l}d before the deadline.{excessiveUptimeWarningMessage}{diskSpaceWarningMessage}

For assistance, please contact **{supportTeamName}** by clicking the (?) button in the bottom, right-hand corner.

Assembled **Ein erforderliches macOS-{titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} ist jetzt verfuegbar**

Hallo, {loggedInUserFirstname}!

Bitte {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} Sie auf macOS **{ddmVersionString}**, damit Ihr Mac sicher bleibt und den organisatorischen Richtlinien entspricht.{updateReadyMessage}

Um die {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} jetzt durchzufuehren, klicken Sie auf **{button1text}**, folgen Sie den Anweisungen auf dem Bildschirm und klicken Sie dann auf **{softwareUpdateButtonText}**.

Wenn Sie diese {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} jetzt nicht durchfuehren koennen, klicken Sie auf **{button2text}**, um spaeter erneut erinnert zu werden (diese Option wird deaktiviert, wenn die Frist unmittelbar bevorsteht).

Ihr Geraet **wird jedoch automatisch neu gestartet und {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l}t** am **{ddmEnforcedInstallDateHumanReadable}**, wenn Sie die {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} nicht vor Ablauf der Frist abgeschlossen haben.{excessiveUptimeWarningMessage}{diskSpaceWarningMessage}

Wenn Sie Unterstuetzung benoetigen, kontaktieren Sie bitte **{supportTeamName}**, indem Sie unten rechts auf die (?) Schaltflaeche klicken.

Assembled **Une {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} macOS requise est maintenant disponible**

Bonjour, {loggedInUserFirstname}!

Veuillez effectuer la {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} vers macOS **{ddmVersionString}** afin de maintenir la securite et la conformite de votre Mac aux politiques de votre organisation.{updateReadyMessage}

Pour effectuer la {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} maintenant, cliquez sur **{button1text}**, suivez les instructions a l'ecran, puis cliquez sur **{softwareUpdateButtonText}**.

Si vous ne pouvez pas effectuer cette {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l} maintenant, cliquez sur **{button2text}** pour recevoir un nouveau rappel plus tard (ce bouton est desactive lorsque l'echeance est imminente).

Cependant, votre appareil **redemarrera automatiquement et effectuera la {titleMessageUpdateOrUpgrade:l}** le **{ddmEnforcedInstallDateHumanReadable}** si vous ne l'avez pas effectuee avant l'echeance.{excessiveUptimeWarningMessage}{diskSpaceWarningMessage}

Pour obtenir de l'aide, veuillez contacter **{supportTeamName}** en cliquant sur le bouton (?) en bas a droite.
